TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Yes. They then get rid of it using Wereshampoo.

When will this forum die?

When human beings run out of stupid questions.

Why would anybody want it to?

A stupid question.

But really, why?

They wouldn't because when the last stupid question is asked the person dreaming our reality wakes up and we disappear.

 

Why is it whenever anyone says the phrase "in a minute" it's always more than one?

Relativity. Your minutes differ.

If there are sixty seconds in a minute, so how many firsts are in it?

Only 1, you only get 1 first.

If you spend a minute in the event horizon of a black hole, how long are you there for?

Please, wait a minute. Your call is very important for us.

Why do they not write "a second" as "a 2nd", while write "the second" as "the 2nd"?

Because it would be born "of two firsts" and no one wants that. Besides it's bad enough having a bare bear, a bee just being, or complimenting your complements.

 

So if bending space makes you faster than light, and punching through space makes you teleport, would kissing space make it feel better?

Yes the breakfast monster will eat calvins and Hobbes tree house.

Spoon?

Spoiler

A nospoon.

A nother nospoon.

Three nospoons.

***

If there is no spoon, how do they no what's a spoon?

Because to no a spoon they must first know a spoon. They use the teachings of the Magic 8 Ball for this

 

 

So if you know when to hold'em, know when to fold'em, know when to walk away and know when to run, why do you still lose poker games?

Cause you forgot and counted your money at the table, there will be time enough for counting when the dealings done.

Do you think the trees are happy?

Every time when somebody falls to provide them with a fresh portion of fertilizer.

Why do they think that in Matrix they said "No spoon!" ?
Maybe it was "Know spoon!" The subtitles may be wrong.

Subtitles are never wrong. It's the actors that are wrong.

 

If a spoon is in orbit around Earth does that mean you can scoop the Milky Way?

yes, it scoop the ocan.

what happen if we have ?

Desert.

If you could only have 1 utensile, what would it be?

A wallet.

Which model of the Tesla car was owned by Tesla?

The first one.

Who is there?

Yes, who is.

Why do the "ice cream" and "eye scream" sound similar?

Because they both have extreme reactions from the public.

 

Why are the road signs different in different places.

Some states allow guns, other don't.

Why distract the driver's attention with the road signs?

Because they can't contain the road departments who put them up.

Why do we need roads?

Where else would we use sidewalk chalk?

 

Why is a bird in the hand worth two in the bush if you have a hound dog and a shotgun?

Because the thing in the bush can be another hunter with a hound dog and a shotgun.

Why do they keep hunting animals when a microscope allows them to provide a mass genocide.

Because everybody who says, "Look how smart I am" as they place the barrel against the side ot their heads and ignite a combustible, removes 1 more Darwin Award winner from the gene pool.

Why do people believe in something simply because they are told to?
